---
category: news
title: "First U.S. CLIA Lab Implements Alpenglow's 3D Spatial Biology Platform Extending AI-Enabled Pathology to 3D"
excerpt: "A recent study in Cancer Research compared 2D-based AI-algorithms head-to-head with 3D AI-algorithms using Alpenglow's open top lightsheet imager to stratify patients based on prostate cancer risk. The study found a 10x improvement using computational 3D pathology techniques based on hazard ratio separation in Kaplan Meier survival curves."
